attributes.action: Change the law so as to give secondary schools the right to choose their own names and not councils.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2006 Ysgol Gyfun Rhydfelen moved to a new site in Church Village. The name Gartholwg was forced upon the school despite opposition from past and present puils. The aim of this petition ois to give schools the rite to make the desicion on its name.
